news.title: Gentoo Web Redesign Contest -- The Poll is Open

body.p:
After ridiculously long delays, voting is finally underway in the Gentoo Website Redesign Contest. The five finalist entries may be viewed at the
contest page . It is now up to the Gentoo community to choose the winning design. The poll will be open until Friday, 8 October 2004. Our sincere thanks both to the people who submitted entries and to those who are voting to help us select a winner.
